about_the_game:
If you're enjoying The Adventures of Nerdstan and would like to Support The Developer and Future projects, the Supporter Pack is perfect for you.

Contents:
  • Fully Colored One Page Nerdstan Comic
  • High Resolution Poster
  • The Full Story of The Game So Far
  • Phone Wallpaper

Important note: By Buying this DLC you are showing your support for the game and the developer. This DLC Does Not Offer Any In-Game Bonuses!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
